title: Automate Your Mac Setup: A Developer's Guide
summary: Learn how to automatically configure a new Mac for development in about an hour instead of doing it manually, with tools for installing software, configuring your shell, and setting up a consistent environment.

title: Beyond the Hype: A Practical Guide to Cloud and Datacenter Decisions
summary: An in-depth analysis of cloud vs datacenter choices, focusing on key business considerations, trade-offs, and real-world examples to help organizations make informed infrastructure decisions.

title: How to toggle Dark Mode in MacOS Mojave from the command line
summary: Learn how to quickly toggle between light and dark mode in macOS Mojave using terminal commands and AppleScript, with a simple bash alias to make switching modes easier.
